items.title: Repository scanner package
items.description: Core scanning logic for Git repos and go.mod analysis

items.title: CLI with configurable flags
items.description: Flags for dir, format, show-clean, summary, dep, and recurse

items.title: Progress bar during scanning
items.description: Visual progress indicator with percentage and current repo name

items.title: List and table output formats
items.description: Human-readable list format and compact markdown table format

items.title: Dependency filtering
items.description: Filter repos by module dependency path

items.title: Nested go.mod detection
items.description: Recursive search for go.mod files in monorepos

items.title: Unit tests for scanner package
items.description: Test coverage for go.mod parsing, module matching, and repo analysis

items.title: Improve error handling in findGoModFiles
items.description: Handle WalkDir errors explicitly instead of silently ignoring (scanner.go:172)

items.title: Guard against empty path in tilde expansion
items.description: Add explicit check before accessing dirPath[0] in main.go:51

items.title: Add go.sum file
items.description: Include go.sum for module verification (empty with zero dependencies)

items.title: Add -version flag
items.description: Display version information with build details

items.title: Enhanced help output
items.description: More detailed -help output with examples and usage patterns

items.title: Terminal width detection for progress bar
items.description: Use actual terminal width instead of hardcoded 100 spaces for cleanup

items.title: Parallel repository scanning
items.description: Concurrent analysis for improved performance on large directory sets

items.title: Detect unpushed commits
items.description: Check if local branch is ahead of remote

items.title: Detect stale branches
items.description: Identify repos with old unmerged branches

content.value: gitscan is a CLI tool to scan multiple Git repositories and identify repos that need attention. It helps prioritize which repos to update, commit, and push.

version_history.summary: Initial release with core scanning functionality
